---
title: "Web Scraping - Pt. 1"
output: html_notebook
---

```{r}
library(rvest)
library(tibble)
library(stringr)

url = "http://www.imdb.com/"
page = read_html(url)
```

```{r}
movies = page %>% 
  html_nodes(".aux-content-widget-2:nth-child(15) .title")

df = data_frame(
        title = movies %>% html_nodes("a") %>% html_text() %>% str_trim(),
        box_office = movies %>% 
                     html_nodes("span") %>% 
                     html_text() %>%
                     str_replace("Weekend: \\$","") %>%
                     str_replace("M","") %>%
                     as.numeric(), 
        link = movies %>% 
               html_nodes("a") %>% 
               html_attr("href") %>%
               paste0(url, .)
)
```

```{r}
for(i in seq_along(df$link))
{
  new_page = read_html(df$link[i])
}
```
